messages.message: What would it take to enable split document for eml in converse? It seems to only keep the body of the email and removes the attachments. Can we consider having them be uploaded as seperate files. cc @Hari
@joshbronko I haven't tested it yet but does the attachments doesn't get stripped and added to the project? I will check it as well!
It gets stripped out in converse

Thanks!! I will check on this. Process files already provides this info, we should have them added to the project.
cc: @Balaram
Thanks for reporting this. I have a created a ticket (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-1042) to track this.
